hero.title: Empowering Women Through
hero.description1: EmpowerHerEd is more than just a learning platform - it's a pathway to support, teach, and fund young women in Rwanda. Our mission is to bridge the gender gap in technology by providing women with the knowledge, resources, and confidence they need to thrive in the digital world.
hero.description2: Join Rwanda's premier digital education platform. Learn from industry experts, connect with mentors, and launch your tech career. Whether you're just starting out or looking to enhance your skills, we're here to guide your journey.

hero.title: Online Communication & Collaboration
hero.description: Empowering young women in Rwanda to communicate and work effectively in the digital world.

overview.title: Program Overview
overview.description: This program equips participants with the digital communication and collaboration skills necessary for modern work and learning environments. Through interactive sessions and practical projects, you'll become confident using tools and strategies to collaborate online.

citizenship.title: Digital Citizenship
citizenship.description: Safe, respectful, and effective online behavior

basics.title: Digital Communication Basics
basics.description: Understand how to communicate effectively in online environments.

tools.title: Collaboration Tools
tools.description: Learn to use modern tools for online teamwork and productivity.

meetings.title: Virtual Meeting Skills
meetings.description: Gain confidence in organizing and participating in virtual meetings.

team.title: Team Communication Strategies
team.description: Develop techniques for leading and working within remote teams.

safety.title: Online Safety & Professionalism
safety.description: Maintain security, professionalism, and trust in digital spaces.

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.subtitle: Inspiring Journeys of Our Graduates
successStories.description: Read about the amazing achievements of our community members

stories.name: Marie Uwase
stories.quote: Thanks to EmpowHerEd, I learned basic computer and communication skills that helped me get a job as a data entry clerk. Now I confidently manage digital records and communicate clearly with my team.
stories.achievement: Gained employment as a data entry clerk through newly acquired digital skills.

stories.name: Grace Mukamana
stories.quote: EmpowHerEd gave me the skills to start my own online business. Learning to send professional emails and use social media helped me reach customers and grow my sales every month.
stories.achievement: Launched and grew an online business using communication and computer skills.

stories.name: Sarah Mutoni
stories.quote: Before EmpowHerEd, I struggled to help my children with school and communicate with their teachers. Now, I can join virtual meetings and send emails easily.
stories.achievement: Improved parental engagement through virtual communication tools.

stories.name: Claire Uwimana
stories.quote: After completing the EmpowHerEd training, I was promoted at work to administrative assistant. I learned how to organize schedules, prepare documents, and communicate effectively using digital tools.
stories.achievement: Earned promotion to administrative assistant thanks to improved skills.

stories.name: Joyce Mukeshimana
stories.quote: Volunteering as a community outreach coordinator was made possible because EmpowHerEd taught me how to communicate professionally. Now I confidently connect with leaders and organize events that make a difference.
stories.achievement: Became a community outreach coordinator using professional communication skills.

stories.name: Esther Nyiraneza
stories.quote: I never imagined I could work in IT support. Thanks to EmpowHerEd, I learned the basics of troubleshooting and professional communication, and now I help my coworkers solve their tech problems every day.
stories.achievement: Started working in IT support with foundational tech and communication skills.

stories.name: Alice Uwamahoro
stories.quote: EmpowHerEd helped me build my resume and practice interviews. Because of the program, I landed my first job in customer service and gained confidence to face new challenges.
stories.achievement: Secured first job in customer service through enhanced communication and job skills.

stories.name: Beatrice Mutoni
stories.quote: With the skills from EmpowHerEd, I completed an online course in digital marketing. This opened new career paths for me and helped me expand my professional network.
stories.achievement: Completed digital marketing course and expanded professional opportunities.

stories.name: Diane Uwase
stories.quote: EmpowHerEd showed me how to use spreadsheets to manage my family’s finances and how to communicate confidently with banks and service providers.
stories.achievement: Improved family financial management and communication with institutions.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Join our community of women in tech and take the first step towards your future

hero.title: About
hero.description: Empowering women through technology, education, and community support.

story.title: Our Story
story.description1: EmpowerHerEd was born from a simple but powerful idea: when women are educated and empowered, entire communities prosper. Founded by a passionate team of educators, mentors, and advocates, EmpowerHerEd exists to bridge the gender gap in education and opportunity.
story.description2: Our platform is a safe, inclusive space where women and girls can learn, connect, and grow academically, professionally, and personally.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: We offer curated educational content, mentorship programs, workshops, and career support to help women at every stage of their journey. From high school students to working professionals, we're here to uplift, equip, and empower.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bridge the gender gap in technology by providing women with the skills, resources, and support they need to succeed in the tech industry.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where women are equally represented in technology and have the opportunity to shape the future of innovation.

whyItMatters.title: Why It Matters
whyItMatters.description: Despite progress, millions of women around the world still face limited access to education and leadership roles. EmpowerHerEd is changing that by nurturing confidence, capability, and community.
whyItMatters.highlight: Together, we are shaping a future where education is a right and not a privilege for every woman.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These core values guide everything we do at EmpowerHerEd

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: We believe in empowering women through education and skill development.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building a supportive network of women in tech who lift each other up.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Fostering creativity and innovation in technology through diverse perspectives.
